SELECT hi.MENU_TYPE ,hi.MENU_CODE ,B.MENU_NAME ,hi.UPPER_MENU_CODE ,LEVEL ,hi.MENU_LEVEL ,MENU_ORDER ,CASE WHEN MENU_LEVEL = 1 THEN MENU_ORDER * 10000 WHEN MENU_LEVEL = 2 THEN (SELECT MENU_ORDER * 10000 FROM TB_MENU WHERE MENU_CODE = hi.UPPER_MENU_CODE) + MENU_ORDER * 100 WHEN MENU_LEVEL = 3 THEN (SELECT MENU_ORDER * 10000 FROM TB_MENU WHERE MENU_CODE = (SELECT UPPER_MENU_CODE FROM TB_MENU WHERE MENU_CODE = hi.UPPER_MENU_CODE)) + UPPER_MENU_ORDER * 100 + MENU_ORDER ELSE MENU_ORDER END AS LEVEL_ORDER FROM ( SELECT hierarchy_connect_by_parent_eq_prior_id(MENU_CODE) AS MENU_CODE, @level AS level FROM ( SELECT @start_with := (SELECT UPPER_MENU_CODE FROM TB_MENU WHERE MENU_LEVEL = 0 AND MENU_TYPE = #SRCH_MENU_TYPE# ), @id := @start_with, @level := 0 ) vars ,TB_MENU WHERE @id IS NOT NULL ) ho ,(SELECT A.* ,IFNULL(B.MENU_ORDER, 0) AS UPPER_MENU_ORDER FROM TB_MENU A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MENU B ON B.MENU_CODE = A.UPPER_MENU_CODE ) hi ,TB_MENU_NM B WHERE hi.MENU_CODE = ho.MENU_CODE AND hi.MENU_TYPE = #SRCH_MENU_TYPE# AND hi.MENU_TYPE = B.MENU_TYPE AND hi.MENU_CODE = B.MENU_CODE AND B.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD#
AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM TB_MENU_USERGROUP WHERE MENU_TYPE = #SRCH_MENU_TYPE# AND USER_TYPE = #SRCH_USER_TYPE# AND MENU_CODE = B.MENU_CODE )
ORDER BY LEVEL_ORDER

SELECT A.MENU_TYPE , A.MENU_CODE , A.UPPER_MENU_CODE , B.MENU_NAME , A.MENU_LEVEL , IFNULL(A.LINK_URL, '') AS LINK_URL , IFNULL(A.LINK_PARAM, '') AS LINK_PARAM , A.MENU_ORDER , A.USE_YN FROM TB_MENU A ,TB_MENU_NM B WHERE A.MENU_TYPE = B.MENU_TYPE AND A.MENU_CODE = B.MENU_CODE AND A.MENU_CODE = #MENU_CODE# AND B.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD#

SELECT A.USER_TYPE ,C.CODE_NM USER_TYPE_NAME ,A.USER_ROLE ,D.USER_ROLE_NM FROM TB_MENU_USERGROUP A ,TB_CODE B ,TB_CODE_NM C ,TB_USER_ROLE_MASTER D WHERE A.MENU_CODE = #MENU_CODE# AND A.USER_TYPE = B.CODE_ID AND B.CODE_GROUP_ID = 'USER_TYPE' AND B.CODE_GROUP_ID = C.CODE_GROUP_ID AND B.CODE_ID = C.CODE_ID AND C.LANG_CD = #LANG_CD# AND A.USER_TYPE = D.USER_TYPE AND A.USER_ROLE = D.USER_ROLE ORDER BY A.USER_TYPE, D.USER_ROLE_NM
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(MENU_ORDER), 1) AS MAX_MENU_ORDER FROM TB_MENU WHERE UPPER_MENU_CODE = #UPPER_MENU_CODE#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_MENU SET LINK_URL = #LINK_URL# ,LINK_PARAM = #LINK_PARAM# ,MENU_ORDER = #MENU_ORDER# ,USE_YN = #USE_YN# ,UPDATE_USER_ID = #LOGIN_ID# ,UPDATE_DT = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d') WHERE MENU_TYPE = #MENU_TYPE# AND MENU_CODE = #MENU_CODE#

INSERT /* Menu_Mysql.xml menu.updateMenuNm */ INTO TB_MENU_NM ( MENU_TYPE, MENU_CODE, LANG_CD, MENU_NAME, INSERT_USER_ID, INSERT_DT) VALUES ( #MENU_TYPE#, #MENU_CODE#, #LANG_CD#, #MENU_NAME#, #LOGIN_ID#, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE MENU_NAME = #MENU_NAME#, UPDATE_USER_ID = #LOGIN_ID#, UPDATE_DT = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s' )

UPDATE TB_MENU SET MENU_ORDER = MENU_ORDER - 1 ,UPDATE_USER_ID = #LOGIN_ID# ,UPDATE_DT = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE UPPER_MENU_CODE = #UPPER_MENU_CODE# AND MENU_ORDER > #OLD_MENU_ORDER# AND MENU_ORDER <= #MENU_ORDER#

UPDATE TB_MENU SET MENU_ORDER = MENU_ORDER + 1 ,UPDATE_USER_ID = #LOGIN_ID# ,UPDATE_DT = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE UPPER_MENU_CODE = #UPPER_MENU_CODE# AND MENU_ORDER < #OLD_MENU_ORDER# AND MENU_ORDER >= #MENU_ORDER#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MENU_USERGROUP ( MENU_TYPE ,MENU_CODE ,USER_TYPE ,USER_ROLE ,INSERT_USER_ID ,INSERT_DT ) SELECT #MENU_TYPE# ,#MENU_CODE# ,USER_TYPE ,USER_ROLE ,#LOGIN_ID# ,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') FROM TB_USER_ROLE_MASTER WHERE USER_TYPE = 'M'
sqlMap.select: SELECT CONCAT(#UPPER_MENU_CODE#, IF(IFNULL(MAX(MENU_CODE), '9999') = '9999', '001', LPAD(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(MAX(MENU_CODE), LENGTH(UPPER_MENU_CODE)+1, 3), UNSIGNED) + 1, 3, '0'))) AS MENU_CODE ,IFNULL(MAX(MENU_LEVEL), 0) AS MENU_LEVEL ,IFNULL(MAX(MENU_ORDER), 0) + 1 AS MENU_ORDER FROM TB_MENU WHERE MENU_TYPE = #MENU_TYPE# AND UPPER_MENU_CODE = #UPPER_MENU_CODE#
